nodes.name: getUnderlyingPrice

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "only guardian may set the SAI price"

arguments.value: only guardian may set the SAI price

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "only guardian may set the SAI price"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "SAI price may only be set once"

arguments.value: SAI price may only be set once

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "SAI price may only be set once"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the price of SAI, permanently
@param price The price for SAI
nodes.name: setSaiPrice

attributes.name: getUnderlyingPrice

attributes.documentation:
@notice Set the price of SAI, permanently
@param price The price for SAI
attributes.name: setSaiPrice

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "only guardian may set the SAI price"

attributes.type: literal_string "only guardian may set the SAI price"
attributes.value: only guardian may set the SAI price

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "SAI price may only be set once"

attributes.type: literal_string "SAI price may only be set once"
attributes.value: SAI price may only be set once

params.cDaiAddress_: The address of cDAI, which will be read from a special oracle key
params.cEthAddress_: The address of cETH, which will return a constant 1e18, since all prices relative to ether
params.cSaiAddress_: The address of cSAI, which may be read directly from storage
params.cUsdcAddress_: The address of cUSDC, which will be read from a special oracle key
params.cUsdtAddress_: The address of cUSDT, which uses the cUSDC price
params.guardian_: The address of the guardian, which may set the SAI price once
params.v1PriceOracle_: The address of the v1 price oracle, which will continue to operate and hold prices for collateral assets

params.cToken: The cToken to get the underlying price of

getUnderlyingPrice(address).return: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a listed cToken asset

setSaiPrice(uint256).notice: Set the price of SAI, permanently
